name: browser-devtools-mcp
description: MCP Server for Browser Dev Tools
long_description: Browser DevTools MCP exposes a Playwright-powered browser runtime to AI agents, enabling deep, bidirectional debugging and interaction with live web pages. It supports both visual understanding and code-level inspection of browser state, making it ideal for AI-driven exploration, diagnosis, and automation.
